attributes.action: Get Jack Tweed home to Jade Goody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have created a petition started on Facebook to get Jack Tweed to be able to spend every night with his new wife Jade Goody.
Re register his bail conditions so he can reside at her home,so they can spend every night together.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
